posts.title: My Sweet Scooter
posts.body: I love my scooter so much. Its name is Skip. Skip never lets me down.

posts.title: My Awesome Safety Vest
posts.body: My vest is reflective. It keeps me safe at night.

posts.title: Taking the Bus
posts.body: Taking the bus to school is exciting. I enjoy sitting in a seat and not having to pedal while I commute.
